comment:
* A class that represents an event for each change in the state of a monitoring system.
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: public int getMonitoringType()
methods.comment: * Returns the type of the monitoring system that has a change on its state.

methods.name: public int getMonitoringStatus()
methods.comment: * Returns the new status associated with the monitoring system.

methods.name: public int getSourceTechnologies()
methods.comment: * Returns the source technologies that the status is associated to.

methods.name: public Location getLocation()
methods.comment: * Returns the last known location according to the monitoring system.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel parcel, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel parcel, int flags)
